document_data.name: ''Philosopher's Egg''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''philosopher's egg''''' was an [[enchanted]] piece of glassware that aided in the creation of magical fluids such as [[potion]]s.
document_data.Powers: These magical retorts aided in making magical and mundane fluids by halving the time needed to make them. A ''philosopher's egg'' was also a [[material component]] in the process of creating [[gold]] from lead.
document_data.Notable Owners: [[Khenel Barony]], a [[wizard]] from [[Waterdeep]], owned a ''philosopher's egg''.{{Cite card/AD&D Trading Cards/1992|425|Khenel Barony}}{{Cite card/AD&D Trading Cards/1992|501|Khenel's Philosopher's Egg}}
